EmailTemplate.name: PRM ARR NDAC InfoCenter-Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for access to Nokia DAC Info Center Access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
You have now been registered to the Nokia DAC Info Center. To login, please proceed with step 2 (on page 6) of this presentation. Reach out to partner.support@nokia.com in case of questions.
The Nokia Partner Portal Team
